attributes.action: Make online trolls accountable for their actions with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details: I have recently been bullied online over a selfie of myself to which people replied with “get on a treadmill” or “go and kill yourself” so i want those accountable to be punished!
attributes.background: Have more indepth reviews on reports of online trolling / bullying and make the prosecutors accountable for their actions

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/333146
